r.s: The PEAR Numbers_Words package provides methods for spelling numerals in words.
r.d: With Numbers_Words class you can convert numbers written in arabic digits to words in several languages. You can convert an integer between -infinity and infinity. If your system does not support such long numbers you can call Numbers_Words::toWords() with just a string.
r.n: New lang files for de (German), pt_BR (Brazilian Portuguese), es (Spanish). First PEAR release.
